page.title: 06THE WAYS WE WORSHIP & PRAY
page.content: Most people who live near our school attend Church of England,Baptist or Catholic church services.Some observe different ways of worship;Hindu,World Wide Church of God,Muslim and Jehovah's Witness. Cara is a Christian,she goes to Sunday School on Sunday morning where they discuss things from the Bible.Her parents listen to a service and sing hymns.At 9.45 the children come in & they all take Holy Communion,that is when you take the Bread & Wine.Cara has been confirmed,that means she is a part of the Church and God.The Bread & Wine represent the Flesh & Blood of Jesus Christ.They speak to God in Church because that is God's House.The Christians take their name from Christ and try to live as he would like them to.
